data.actual_result: It stays, and if you attempt to jump to it, you will be taken to a completely empty server with no name, no channel, no menu...
data.expected_result: The server should disappear from the Quick Switcher
data.short_description: Leaving a server from the Quick Switcher won't make it disappear from the Quick switcher (until its closed). Then attempting to jump to it takes you to... the void
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick Switcher - In the most recent servers that are displayed just below the searchbar, long-press one server - Tap Leave Server
